articles.title: Researchers discover fossil of new species of pangolin in Europe - Science Daily
articles.description: Deeper analysis of fossils from one of Eastern Europe's most significant paleontological sites has led to the discovery of a new species of pangolin, previously thought to have existed in Europe during the early Pleistocene but not confirmed until now.

articles.title: EU replaces travel ban on South Africa with testing requirements - BusinessTech
articles.description: European Union member states have agreed to lift the air travel ban on southern African countries, which will allow more travel to resume.
articles.content:
European Union member states have agreed to lift the air travel ban on southern African countries, which will allow more travel to resume.

articles.title: Syria's Assad regime on trial in Europe | The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News — World - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: A growing number of cases are being brought in Europe, and especially Germany, against loyalists of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's regime on accusations of state-sponsored torture.
